name: Wordwise Songs Multiple Choice Quiz | Other Music

questions.text:
New to wordwise?  A wordwise puzzle is a puzzle that shows something like papotsns, which, if read properly, shows pots in pans, or pots and pans.  You can also play the quiz "How to play wordwise quizzes" in the Brain Teasers section for more help on wordwise quizzes.  This quiz covers songs in wordwise form!

Here we go!

____________Lean_______________
_____________Me________________
questions.explanation:
Lean on Me.

	This song was performed by Mitchell Musso, a remake of Bill Withers' song.  The song was first released by Bill Withers in 1972.

Run it Back Again.

	This is a song sung by Corbin Bleu.  It is one of the many songs in the movie "Minute Men."  "Minute Men" is a movie about two friends who go back in time to help all nerds and geeks!

Bleeding Love.

	"Bleeding Love" was written by Jesse McCartney and Ryan Tedder.  The song was sung by Leona Lewis, and became a best selling hit in 2006 in the UK, and worldwide became the best selling hit of 2008 worldwide!  That is a popular song!

Witch Doctor.

	"Witch Doctor" was one of the first Alvin and the Chipmunk songs.  The song dates back to the 1950s.  At this time, there was only one chipmunk, who did not sing much.  The song was mainly sung by "David Seville," and Alvin was not yet named.  The machine used to make this song was brand new, and could alter voices to a high pitched voice, like a chipmunk.

I Think About You.

	This song was sung by Collin Raye in 1995.  "I Think About You" was also the title of the 1995 album.  It gained platinum records, and the "I Think About You" single was one of Collin Raye's best selling singles, as was "One Boy, One Girl."

I Want My Mullet Back.

	Billy Ray Cyrus sung this song in 2006.  It was released on Billy Ray Cyrus' album, "I Wanna Be Your Joe," and was one of his biggest hits on the soundtrack.

Manic Monday.

	"Manic Monday" was sung by the Bangles.  It was their first hit in 1986.  It was written by Prince in 1984.

questions.text: Aa bb cc dd ee ff gg hh ii jj kk ll mm nn oo pp qq rr ss tt U vv ww xx yy zz
questions.explanation:
Only You.

	The song was first recorded by the Platters in 1955!  It is often called "Only You (And You Alone)" as its title in full.  Alvin and the Chipmunks remade the song for the "Alvin and the Chipmunks" movie.

Shiftwork & Shift Work.

	Kenny Chesney sang this song, and it featured George Strait.  It was released in 2007 in the album "Just Who I Am: Poets and Pirates."  Chesney started his career in 1994 with his album "In My Wildest Dreams."

questions.correct: Burning Up & Burnin' Up & Burnin Up
questions.explanation:
Burning Up & Burnin' Up & Burnin Up.

	"Burnin' Up" was released in 2008 in the US in the Jonas Brother's soundtrack "A Little Bit Longer."  Hits on this album include "Burnin' Up," "Lovebug," and "A Little Bit Longer."  The song is a worldwide hit, coming in at number 14 in Canada, 5 in the US, 31 in Australia, 21 in Ireland, 30 in the UK, 31 in Italy, and 4 in Argentina!  It was released in June in the US, and in September 2008 for most of the rest of the world.
